description.english: You have scored a first win against a virtual opponent.
description.german: Sie haben Ihren ersten Sieg gegen einen virtuellen Gegner errungen.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu une première victoire contre une IA.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto la prima vittoria contro un avversario virtuale.
description.spanish: Has logrado una primera victoria contra un oponente virtual.
description.dutch: Je hebt je eerste overwinning op een virtuele tegenstander binnen.
description.brazilian: Conseguiu uma primeira vitória contra um oponente virtual.

description.english: You have successfully completed all the Discovery challenges.
description.german: Sie haben erfolgreich alle „Entdeckung“-Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez réussi le pack de missions "la voie de l'éveil".
description.italian: Hai completato con successo tutte le sfide Scoperta.
description.spanish: Has completado con éxito todos los desafíos de Descubrimiento.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle Ontdekking-uitdagingen voltooid
description.brazilian: Teve sucesso com o pack de missões "o caminho do despertar".

description.english: You have successfully completed all the Beginners challenges.
description.german: Sie haben erfolgreich alle „Anfänger“-Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez réussi le pack de missions "les chemins de l'initiation".
description.italian: Hai completato con successo tutte le sfide Principianti.
description.spanish: Has completado con éxito todos los desafíos de Principiantes.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle Beginner-uitdagingen voltooid
description.brazilian: Teve sucesso com o pack de missões "os caminhos da iniciação".

description.english: You have successfully completed all the Skills challenges.
description.german: Sie haben erfolgreich alle „Fertigkeiten“-Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez réussi le pack de missions "la maîtrise des éléments".
description.italian: Hai completato con successo tutte le sfide Abilità.
description.spanish: Has completado con éxito todos los desafíos de Habilidades.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle Vaardigheden-uitdagingen voltooid
description.brazilian: Teve sucesso com o pack de missões "o domínio dos elementos".

description.english: You have successfully completed all the Timed challenges.
description.german: Sie haben erfolgreich alle „Zeitig“-Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez réussi le pack de missions "Le contrôle du temps".
description.italian: Hai completato con successo tutte le sfide A tempo.
description.spanish: Has completado con éxito todos los desafíos de Contrarreloj.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle Getimed-uitdagingen voltooid
description.brazilian: Teve sucesso com o pack de missões "o controle do tempo".

description.english: You have successfully completed all the Perfect Balance challenges.
description.german: Sie haben erfolgreich alle „Perfekte Balance“-Herausforderungen abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez réussi le pack de missions "le parfait équilibre".
description.italian: Hai completato con successo tutte le sfide Equilibrio perfetto.
description.spanish: Has completado con éxito todos los desafíos de Equilibrio perfecto.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle Perfecte balans-uitdagingen voltooid
description.brazilian: Teve sucesso com o pack de missões "o equilíbrio perfeito".

description.english: You have finished Abalone's Challenge mode.
description.german: Sie haben den Herausforderungsmodus von Abalone abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le mode "Défi" d'Abalone.
description.italian: Hai completato la modalità Sfida in Abalone.
description.spanish: Has completado la modalidad Desafío de Abalone.
description.dutch: Je hebt de uitdagingsmodus van Abalone voltooid
description.brazilian: Terminou o mode "desafio" de Abalone.

description.english: You have lost more than 50 games against a virtual opponent.
description.german: Sie haben über 50 Spiele gegen einen virtuellen Gegner verloren.
description.french: Vous avez perdu plus de 50 parties contre une IA.
description.italian: Hai perso più di 50 partite contro un avversario virtuale.
description.spanish: Has perdido más de 50 partidas contra un oponente virtual.
description.dutch: Je hebt meer dan 50 potjes tegen een virtuele tegenstander verloren.
description.brazilian: Perdeu mais de 50 partidas contra uma IA.

description.english: You have won 25 games against a virtual opponent.
description.german: Sie haben 25 Spiele gegen einen virtuellen Gegner gewonnen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté 25 parties contre l'IA.
description.italian: Hai vinto 25 partite contro un avversario virtuale.
description.spanish: Has ganado más de 25 partidas contra un oponente virtual.
description.dutch: Je hebt 25 potjes tegen een virtuele tegenstander gewonnen.
description.brazilian: Ganhou 25 partidas contra a IA.

description.english: You have won 100 games against a virtual opponent.
description.german: Sie haben 100 Spiele gegen einen virtuellen Gegner gewonnen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté 100 parties contre l'IA.
description.italian: Hai vinto 100 partite contro un avversario virtuale.
description.spanish: Has ganado más de 100 partidas contra un oponente virtual.
description.dutch: Je hebt 100 potjes tegen een virtuele tegenstander gewonnen.
description.brazilian: Ganhou 100 partidas contra a IA.

description.english: You have won more than 250 games against a virtual opponent.
description.german: Sie haben über 250 Spiele gegen einen virtuellen Gegner gewonnen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté 250 parties contre l'IA.
description.italian: Hai vinto più di 250 partite contro un avversario virtuale.
description.spanish: Has ganado más de 250 partidas contra un oponente virtual.
description.dutch: Je hebt meer dan 250 potjes tegen een virtuele tegenstander verloren.
description.brazilian: Ganhou mais de 250 partidas contra a IA.

description.english: You have won a six-marble victory against an easy virtual opponent in under 70 moves.
description.german: Sie haben einen Sechs-Kugel-Sieg gegen einen einfachen virtuellen Gegner mit weniger als 70 Zügen errungen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté une victoire en six billes contre une IA facile en moins de 70 coups.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto una vittoria con sei biglie contro un avversario virtuale di livello facile con meno di 70 mosse.
description.spanish: Has conseguido una victoria de seis canicas contra un oponente virtual fácil en menos de 70 movimientos.
description.dutch: Je hebt met zes kogels een makkelijke virtuele tegenstander met minder dan 70 zetten verslagen.
description.brazilian: Ganhou uma vitória em seis bolinhas contra uma IA fácil em menos de 70 movimentos.

description.english: You have won a six-marble victory against a medium-level virtual opponent in under 50 moves.
description.german: Sie haben einen Sechs-Kugel-Sieg gegen einen mittelschweren virtuellen Gegner mit weniger als 50 Zügen errungen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté une victoire en six billes contre une IA normale en moins de 50 coups.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto una vittoria con sei biglie contro un avversario virtuale di livello medio con meno di 50 mosse.
description.spanish: Has conseguido una victoria de seis canicas contra un oponente virtual de nivel medio en menos de 50 movimientos.
description.dutch: Je hebt met zes kogels een gemiddelde virtuele tegenstander met minder dan 50 zetten verslagen.
description.brazilian: Ganhou uma vitória em seis bolinhas contra uma IA fácil em menos de 50 movimentos.

description.english: You have won a six-marble victory against an advanced virtual opponent in under 35 moves.
description.german: Sie haben einen Sechs-Kugel-Sieg gegen einen fortgeschrittenen virtuellen Gegner mit weniger als 35 Zügen errungen.
description.french: Vous avez remporté une victoire en six billes contre une IA avancée en moins de 35 coups.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto una vittoria con sei biglie contro un avversario virtuale di livello medio con meno di 35 mosse.
description.spanish: Has conseguido una victoria de seis canicas contra un oponente virtual experto en menos de 35 movimientos.
description.dutch: Je hebt met zes kogels een geavanceerde virtuele tegenstander met minder dan 50 zetten verslagen.
description.brazilian: Ganhou uma vitória em seis bolinhas contra uma IA avançada em menos de 35 movimentos.

description.english: You have beaten a virtual opponent in more than 200 moves.
description.german: Sie haben einen virtuellen Gegner mit über 200 Zügen geschlagen.
description.french: Vous avez gagné une partie contre une IA en plus de 200 coups.
description.italian: Hai vinto una partita contro un avversario virtuale con meno di 200 mosse.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a un oponente virtual en más de 200 movimientos.
description.dutch: Je hebt een virtuele tegenstander met meer dan 200 zetten verslagen.
description.brazilian: Ganhou uma vitória contra uma IA avançada em mais de 200 movimentos.

description.english: You have played more than 2,500 moves in total in Abalone.
description.german: Sie haben insgesamt über 2.500 Züge in Abalone gespielt.
description.french: Vous avez cumulé plus de 2500 coups dans Abalone.
description.italian: Hai effettuato più di 2.500 mosse in Abalone.
description.spanish: Has realizado más de 2.500 movimientos en total jugando a Abalone.
description.dutch: Je hebt in totaal meer dan 2500 zetten in Abalone gespeeld.
description.brazilian: Acumulou mais de 2.500 movimentos no Abalone.

description.english: You have played more than 5,000 moves in total in Abalone.
description.german: Sie haben insgesamt über 5.000 Züge in Abalone gespielt.
description.french: Vous avez cumulé plus de 5000 coups dans Abalone.
description.italian: Hai effettuato più di 5.000 mosse in Abalone.
description.spanish: Has realizado más de 5.000 movimientos en total jugando a Abalone.
description.dutch: Je hebt in totaal meer dan 5000 zetten in Abalone gespeeld.
description.brazilian: Acumulou mais de 5.000 movimentos no Abalone.

description.english: You have played more than 10,000 moves in total in Abalone.
description.german: Sie haben insgesamt über 10.000 Züge in Abalone gespielt.
description.french: Vous avez cumulé plus de 10000 coups dans Abalone.
description.italian: Hai effettuato più di 10.000 mosse in Abalone.
description.spanish: Has conseguido una victoria de seis canicas contra un oponente virtual experto en menos de 35 movimientos.
description.dutch: Je hebt in totaal meer dan 10.000 zetten in Abalone gespeeld.
description.brazilian: Acumulou mais de 10.000 movimentos no Abalone.

description.english: You have scored your first victory in a network game.
description.german: Sie haben Ihren ersten Sieg in einem Netzwerkspiel errungen.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu une première victoire en réseau.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto la tua prima vittoria in rete.
description.spanish: Has conseguido tu primera victoria en una partida en red.
description.dutch: Je hebt je eerste overwinning in een netwerkspel behaald.
description.brazilian: Alcançou sua primeira vitória em um jogo de rede.

description.english: You have dominated 50 opponents in the network game.
description.german: Sie haben 50 Gegner im Netzwerkspiel dominiert.
description.french: Vous avez dominé 50 adversaires en réseau.
description.italian: Hai dominato 50 avversari in rete.
description.spanish: Has dominado a 50 oponentes en partidas en red.
description.dutch: Je hebt 50 tegenstanders in het netwerkspel gedomineerd.
description.brazilian: Você denominou 50 adversário no jogo de rede.

description.english: You dominated an opponent with a much better score.
description.german: Sie haben einen Gegner mit einem viel besseren Punktestand dominiert.
description.french: Vous avez dominé un adversaire avec un bien meilleur score.
description.italian: Hai dominato un avversario con un punteggio migliore di molto.
description.spanish: Has dominado a un oponente con una puntuación muy superior.
description.dutch: Je hebt een tegenstander met een veel betere score verslagen.
description.brazilian: Você dominou um adversário com uma pontuação muito melhor.

description.english: You dominated an opponent who is a lot stronger than you.
description.german: Sie haben einen Gegner dominiert, der viel stärker ist als Sie
description.french: Vous avez dominé un adversaire beaucoup plus fort que vous.
description.italian: Hai dominato un avversario molto più forte di te.
description.spanish: Has dominado a un oponente mucho más fuerte que tú.
description.dutch: Je hebt een tegenstander verslagen die veel sterker is dan jij.
description.brazilian: Você dominou um adversário que é um total desconhecido.

description.english: You have played 100 network games.
description.german: Sie haben 100 Netzwerkspiele gespielt.
description.french: Vous avez joué à 100 parties en réseau.
description.italian: Hai giocato 100 partite in rete.
description.spanish: Has jugado 100 partidas de red.
description.dutch: Je hebt 100 netwerkspelletjes gespeeld.
description.brazilian: Você jogou 100 jogos de rede.

description.spanish: Has conseguido una puntuación personal de 750.
description.dutch: Je hebt een persoonlijke score van 750 behaald.
description.brazilian: Você alcançou uma pontuação pessoal de 750.
